title: Pixel turning off before battery hits 0%
content:
My Pixel has been turning off before the battery hits 0% for a few months now. Usually it turns off between 15% and 30% but it turns off even sooner when the data transfer tool is being used to copy data to my new Pixel 3 (up to 71% in one instance).

My initial suspicions were a battery issue but I have noticed that the Pixel does feel a bit warm when it shuts off so I'm also suspecting that it's a heat sensor being tripped.

Any advice on what's going on here?
